p: A hydrocarbon mixture of n-alkanes (C 9–C 22) was analyzed separately under the same chromatographic conditions to calculate the retention indexes with the generalized equation by Van del Dool and Kartz [ 26], Ix = 100[( t x − t n)/( t n+1 – t n) + n], where t n and t n+1 are the retention times of the reference n-alkane hydrocarbons eluting immediately before and after chemical compound “X”; t x is the retention time of compound “X”.
